Upper Bound¶

$\dot{V}{h p}=\mathbf{A}{f} \dot{U}_{f}$

$\dot{U}{f}=\mathbf{A}{c p} \dot{U}_{c}$

$\dot{V}{h p}=\mathbf{A}{f} \mathbf{A}{c p} \dot{U}{c}=\mathbf{A}{m p} \dot{U}{c}$

$\begin{array}{c}{\dot{\mathcal{W}}{e}=\mathcal{D}{p}} \ {\dot{U}{f}^{T}\left(\lambda P{r e f}+P_{c f}\right)=\left(\dot{V}{h p}^{+}\right)^{T} Q{p l}^{+}+\left(\dot{V}{h p}^{-}\right)^{T} Q{p l}^{-}}\end{array}$

$\begin{aligned} \dot{\boldsymbol{V}}{h p}^{+} &=\left{\begin{array}{ll}{\dot{\boldsymbol{V}}{h p}} & {\text { if } \dot{\boldsymbol{V}}{h p}>0} \ {0} & {\text { otherwise }}\end{array}\right.\ \dot{\boldsymbol{V}}{h p}^{-}=\left{\begin{array}{cc}{-\dot{\boldsymbol{V}}{h p}} & {\text { if } \dot{\boldsymbol{V}}{h p}<0} \ {0} & {\text { otherwise }}\end{array}\right.\end{aligned}$

$\dot{V}{h p}^{+}-\dot{V}{h p}^{-}=\mathbf{A}{f} \dot{U}{f}$

$\lambda=\frac{\dot{V}{h p}^{T} Q{p l}}{\dot{U}{f}^{T} P{r e f}}$

$\lambda=\frac{\mathbf{A}{m p}^{T} Q{p l}}{\mathbf{A}{c p}^{T} P{r e f}}$
